Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel; would recommend for business or vacation”
Reviews.Author: kdgr
Reviews.Content: nice modern hotel clean excellent breakfast centrally located staff bit overworked busy werent helpful dont necessarily fault fitness 10am bit late couldnt check 2 single beds spacious huge bathroom met request sidestreet busier street breakfast pretty amazing included basically stay recommend trying book advance price
